title: Item and achievement API not refreshing

comments.author: Malediktus.9250
comments.body: Ah, I was under impression that at least items whitelist automatically because they often appeared when I assumed noone was working at Anet office.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I forgot to go through and whitelist the new items/achievements/recipes/etc — it’s a woefully manual process. Just went through and blessed all the ones that were pending.

comments.author: Malediktus.9250
comments.body: It seems like the item and achievement API stopped whitelisting new stuff 2 days ago. What is up with that?
